name: Bottle Flip That Diving Challenge Endless Flipping
name_original: Bottle Flip That Diving Challenge Endless Flipping
description:
You know what to do. Flip that water bottle. Or soda bottle. Or juice bottle. Just make sure it lands upright on the target! You got what it takes? Download and let's see.

Compete with your friends and see who can get the higher score. Flip on!
